Package com.jack.dicewars.dice_wars

This package contains the Activities and Fragments for the DiceWars app.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    GameController
    Created by Jack Mueller on 4/17/15.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractBoardView
    This class is the superclass for a game Board, which defines basic responsibilities like generating random versions of itself within Configuration parameters and responding to user input.
    AbstractTerritoryView
    This class is the superclass for a game Territory, which is updated with data from the model to display Territory * information to the users.
    GridTextBoardView
    This implementation of AbstractBoardView is to be used in Text Mode.
    GridTextTerritoryView
    This implementation uses Buttons with two characters to represent its data to the users.
    MainGameActivity
    This activity will handle displaying the progression of a DiceWars game.
    ResultsActivity
    This Activity displays statistics of the last Game to the user.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Debug
    This class is for strings I may want to have lying around for development while still complying to checkstyle rules.
    TerritoryColor
    A Color acts as the Primary ID for a Player during a given Game.

Package com.jack.dicewars.dice_wars Description

This package contains the Activities and Fragments for the DiceWars app.
